candidates.name: Vercel
candidates.acceptedAnswer: : Next.js (App/Pages), KV, Blob, Edge Config, Cron, Postgres

candidates.name: Cloudflare Workers
candidates.acceptedAnswer: : Hono/itty router, Durable Objects, KV/R2/D1 bindings

candidates.name: vercel.json → wrangler.toml
candidates.acceptedAnswer: : routes/rewrites/redirects to Pages/Workers routing or _routes.json; headers to headers.json or Workers handlers; env to [vars] + secrets

candidates.name: next.config.js
candidates.acceptedAnswer: : images domains → Cloudflare Images/static fallback; experimental flags warned if unsupported

candidates.name: Pages Router
candidates.acceptedAnswer: : use Pages + Next plugin with minimal changes

candidates.name: App Router
candidates.acceptedAnswer: : supported for many cases; warn on Node-only APIs in Server Actions

candidates.name: Middleware
candidates.acceptedAnswer: : map to Pages/Workers middleware equivalents; validate edge-runtime compatibility

candidates.name: ISR/SSG
candidates.acceptedAnswer: : revalidate via cache + Workers route or Pages functions; fallback SSG at build, dynamic via SSR

candidates.name: API Routes
candidates.acceptedAnswer: : map to Pages Functions or Workers routes

candidates.name: Vercel KV → Cloudflare KV
candidates.acceptedAnswer: : namespace mapping, TTL semantics, size limits, eventual consistency notes

candidates.name: Vercel Blob → Cloudflare R2
candidates.acceptedAnswer: : public/private buckets, signed URLs, migration script with checksum

candidates.name: Postgres
candidates.acceptedAnswer: : keep external PG (e.g., Neon) via HTTP/Prisma for parity, or migrate to D1 where constraints fit

candidates.name: Reporting
candidates.acceptedAnswer: : migration report with risk and effort
